text: Aleksandr Yakovlevich Mikhailov (; born 4 October 1944) is a Soviet and Russian actor. He has appeared in 42 movies since 1973. He starred in the 1981 movie Muzhiki! which was in the 32nd Berlin International Film Festival. He became a People's Artist of the RSFSR (1992). and People's Artist of the Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic (2014). Mikhailov was born in Olovyannaya, Russia. He studied at the Maly Theater. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Russian movie actors
title: Aleksandr Yakovlevich Mikhailov
